name: neighbor favor
description:
description

a typing visual novel where you help your neighbor write some emails! but... some of these emails are strange, aren't they?

how to play

type your dialog and the emails your neighbor wants you to write! press enter to advance the dialog. use the mouse to select emails in the inbox.

credits

built with gamemaker and JuJuAdam's scribble library, sometimes while DT or Annie (visibleworld on itch) were on Discord. thanks for co-working with me!!
